tvdb: Frightened by Brennan's awakening, Livvie tells Lucy ""they"" are punishing her for killing her baby.  Lucy vows to get to the bottom of the Tess mystery, but Livvie denies she and Tess could be twins.  Brennan completely recovers from his coma and he and Kate happily reunite.  Stephen recognizes the tune Tess hums as his song.  Tess hears Jack calling her name and goes to him as Stephen's limo drives away.  Jack takes Tess to his house and promises never to leave her.  Stephen fires his drummer Mick, then gives him an ominous threat.  Stephen announces he's ready to give the town a taste of The Stephen Clay Experience.
